selfPaidVaccineClosure.txt-notice: As of Saturday, May 15, under new CECC directives, the self-paid vaccination program is now closed.
selfPaidVaccineClosure.txt-selfPaid2ndShot: Those who received a first dose are eligible for second appointments and should contact hospitals to schedule their second dose directly. Stay home and save lives. 天佑台灣！

txt-govPaidVaccineDataIncomplete: There are additional hospitals that offer government-paid COVID-19 vaccines that are not listed here. We are working on getting this data on this website. Please visit https://antiflu.cdc.gov.tw/Covid19 for more info.
